responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
Good to see you! What info do you need about our college?
Hi! I'm your college assistant. How can I help?
See you later! Have a great day.
Goodbye! Feel free to ask more questions anytime.
Bye! Happy learning!
Admissions usually start in May. You can apply through our official website portal.
The admission process involves filling out the online form, followed by document verification.
You can find the admission application under the 'Admissions' tab on our college website.
We offer BCA, B.Sc Computer Science, B.Com, and Engineering in various branches like CSE, ECE, and IT.
Our departments include Computer Applications, Science, Commerce, and Engineering.
You can choose from UG and PG courses across multiple streams.

patterns: How much is the semester fee?
responses: Fee structures vary by department. Generally, it ranges from 30k to 80k per semester.
Please visit the accounts office or check the fee circular on the notice board for specific details.
Semester fees can be paid online via the student portal.
Our college has an excellent placement record with top companies like TCS, Infosys, and Wipro visiting every year.
Last year, over 90% of students were placed in reputed firms with good packages.
The Placement Cell provides training in soft skills and aptitude to help students get hired.

patterns: Does the college have a canteen?
responses: Yes, we have a spacious canteen offering a variety of healthy breakfast and lunch options.
The canteen is open from 8:30 AM to 4:30 PM.
We have both veg and non-veg options available in the college mess.
The central library is located in the Main Block, 2nd floor.
The library is open from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM on all working days.
